content.raw:
I think this breaks playback of existing log files, log files that were created without this PR. I see the following:

```
[GUI] [Err] [SystemPaths.cc:438] File [file:///media/nkoenig/data/subt/gz-logs/Kankanwadi/93f2b64b-a026-4c9c-80eb-cd7e741b6146-c-1-r-1/logs//home/developer/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models/Rescue Randy Sitting/1//meshes/rescue_randy.dae] resolved to path [/media/nkoenig/data/subt/gz-logs/Kankanwadi/93f2b64b-a026-4c9c-80eb-cd7e741b6146-c-1-r-1/logs//home/developer/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models/Rescue Randy Sitting/1//meshes/rescue_randy.dae] but the path does not exist
```
content.html:
I think this breaks playback of existing log files, log files that were created without this PR. I see the following:

[GUI] [Err] [SystemPaths.cc:438] File [file:///media/nkoenig/data/subt/gz-logs/Kankanwadi/93f2b64b-a026-4c9c-80eb-cd7e741b6146-c-1-r-1/logs//home/developer/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models/Rescue Randy Sitting/1//meshes/rescue_randy.dae] resolved to path [/media/nkoenig/data/subt/gz-logs/Kankanwadi/93f2b64b-a026-4c9c-80eb-cd7e741b6146-c-1-r-1/logs//home/developer/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models/Rescue Randy Sitting/1//meshes/rescue_randy.dae] but the path does not exist
